title: macgyver font - need to find it
content:
can anyone please help me find the font (or something close) that is used in the macgyver title? preferably free but open. here's a link to a picture of the title.

[http://tinyurl.com/djzpob](http://web.archive.org/web/20121209051924/http:/tinyurl.com/djzpob "http://tinyurl.com/djzpob")

thanks!  
\*jess
author: sphinx

comments.content:
This came up before, it was determined to be custom:

[http://www.typophile.com/node/37082](http://web.archive.org/web/20121209051924/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37082 "http://www.typophile.com/node/37082")

- Lex
